mi:PackageInformation.name: Composite.Media.ImageRotator
mi:PackageInformation.author: Composite A/S
mi:PackageInformation.Description: Displays a random image from a media folder on a page.
mi:PackageInformation.TechnicalDetails: Implemented as XSLT function that randomly displays (rotates) images from a media folder. At least one media folder with images is required.
